channel.title: CVE Feed for Sielco -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sielco -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-0897|2024-08-02T05:24:34.649Z -- sielco -- polyeco1000
item.description: Sielco PolyEco1000 is vulnerable to a session hijack vulnerability due to the cookie being vulnerable to a brute force attack, lack of SSL, and the session being visible in requests.

item.title: CVE-2023-5754|2024-08-02T08:07:32.658Z -- sielco -- polyeco1000
item.description: Sielco PolyEco1000 uses a weak set of default administrative credentials that can be easily guessed in remote password attacks and gain full control of the system.
